summary.para: Closes the media key session and must be called before the key session is released.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the error state associated with the media key session.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the name of the key system name the media keys object was created with.

param.name: keySystem
param.para: The name of the key system.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a unique session id created for this session.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Passes in a key value with any associated data required by the Content Decryption Module for the given key system.

param.name: cb
param.para: The count in bytes of key.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a session with the Digital Rights Management (DRM) key system.
